original_text:
the roar of battle will rise against your people,
    so that all your fortresses will be devastated—
as Shalman devastated Beth Arbel on the day of battle,
    when mothers were dashed to the ground with their children.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희 백성 중에 요란함이 일어나며 네 산성들이 다 무너지되 살만이 전쟁의 날에 벧아벨을 무너뜨린 것 같이 될 것이라 그 때에 어머니와 자식이 함께 부서졌도다

sentences.original_text: the roar of battle will rise
so that all your fortresses will be devastated
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너의 모든 요새가 황폐해질 것이다

sentences.original_text: when mothers were dashed to the ground
